name: Tensei Ryu-Ge Anva
effectText: You can Tribute 1 "Ryu-Ge" monster from your hand or field, except "Tensei Ryu-Ge Anva"; Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it. If this card is destroyed: You can place 1 "Ryu-Ge" Continuous Spell/Trap from your Deck, GY, or banishment, face-up on your field. You can only use each effect of "Tensei Ryu-Ge Anva" once per turn.
pendEffect: You cannot Pendulum Summon, except "Ryu-Ge" monsters (this effect cannot be negated). You can negate your opponent's card or effect activated in response to the activation of your "Ryu-Ge" Spell Card or effect, then destroy this card. You can only use this effect of "Tensei Ryu-Ge Anva" once per turn.
